alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Merrick; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 8:27PM CDT until June 04 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central York County in east central Nebraska... Eastern Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... Central Merrick County in central Nebraska... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 827 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Marquette to near Hampton, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hampton around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Aurora. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 335 and 346. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
